<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", () => {
    const shadowHost = document.querySelector('.flextable-shadow-host');
  
    if (shadowHost) {
        const shadowRoot = shadowHost.shadowRoot;
        if (shadowRoot) {
          const caption = shadowRoot.querySelector('div.tabwid caption');
          if (caption) {
            caption.style.textAlign = 'left';
            caption.style.color = "#677384"
            caption.style.fontSize = "11pt";
            caption.style.fontFamily = "Inter Tight";
          } 
      } else {
        console.warn("Shadow host .flextable-shadow-host not found.");
      }
    }
  });

</script>

<style>
  caption {
    text-align: left !important;
    color: #677384;
    font-size: 11pt;
    font-family: "Inter Tight";
  }
</style>
